sc_aspectratio.help: Aspect ratio for density driven floor-planning

sc_cfgfile.help: Loads configurations from a json file

sc_coremargin.help: Margin around core for density driven floor-planning (um)

sc_coresize.help: Core size (x0 y0 x1 y1) for automated floor-planning (um)

sc_density.help: Target density for density driven floor-planning (percent)

sc_diesize.help: Die size (x0 y0 x1 y1) for automated floor-planning (um)

sc_floorplan.help: User supplied python based floorplaning script

sc_foundry.help: Foundry name (eg: virtual, tsmc, gf, samsung)

sc_lock.help: Switch to lock configuration from further modification

pgmetal.help: Metal layer used for power rails

sc_saif.help: Switching activity (SAIF) file for power analysis

sc_stackup.help: Metal stackup as named in the PDK

pgmetal.help: Metal layer used for power rails

sc_trigger.help: Stage completion that triggers message to <sc_contact>

sc_vcd.help: Value Change Dump (VCD) file for power analysis

sc_verbose.help: Enables verbose printing to screen by EDA tools
